Interface Question

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuestionImpl

    public interface Question
    Each question is stored with it's associated answer and up to 4 option.

    Questions have an integer id starting from 1

    • Method Summary

      Checks the answer provided and responds with a true or false.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the ID of the question.
        Returns:
        id of the question.

        java.lang.String getQuestion()
        Returns the question text.
        Returns:
        questionText.

      • setQuestion

        void setQuestion(java.lang.String question)
        Sets the question text.
        Parameters:
        question - the question text to be added

      • getAnswer

        java.lang.String getAnswer()
        Returns the answer value.
        Returns:
        answer for this question, which will be A, B, C or D.

      • setAnswer

        void setAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        Sets the answer text.
        Parameters:
        answer - the answer text to be added, will be A, B, C or D

      • getOptions

        java.lang.String[][] getOptions()
        Returns the possible answers for this question.
        Returns:
        the possible answers for this question, which will be a string matrix e.g. A, Paris.

      • printOptions

        void printOptions()
        Prints available options for this question.

      • setOptions

        void setOptions(java.lang.String[][] options)
        Sets the answer options for this question.
        Parameters:
        options - a matrix containing A, option 1: B, option 2 etc

      • checkAnswer

        boolean checkAnswer(java.lang.String suppliedAnswer)
        Checks the answer provided and responds with a true or false.
        Parameters:
        suppliedAnswer - is the answer to be checked
        Returns:
        true or false, depending on whether a correct answer has been provided.
